trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.InfoMessage"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.InfoMessage> event contains an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> collection with warnings sent from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.InfoMessage>이벤트에 포함 되어 있는 <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection>데이터 소스에서 보낸 경고를 사용 하 여 컬렉션.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.InfoMessage>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of warnings sent from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 소스에서 전송 된 경고의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The collection of warnings sent from the data source.
Gets the full text of the error sent from the database.
trans-unit.target: 데이터베이스에서 보낸 오류의 전체 텍스트를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This is a wrapper for the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError.Message%2A> property of the first <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> in the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 이에 대 한 래퍼는 <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError.Message%2A>첫 번째 속성 <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError>에 <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The full text of the error.
Retrieves a string representation of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.InfoMessage"></xref> event.
